FROM node:18-alpine AS builder

WORKDIR /app

COPY package*.json ./
RUN npm ci
COPY . .
RUN npx tsc

# Production stage
FROM node:18-alpine

WORKDIR /app

COPY --from=builder /app/package*.json ./
COPY --from=builder /app/dist ./dist
COPY --from=builder /app/node_modules ./node_modules

ENV NODE_ENV=production

EXPOSE 3000

USER node

CMD ["node", "dist/index.js"]

<type>file</type>
<content>1: # Build stage
2: FROM node:20-alpine AS builder
3: 
4: WORKDIR /app
5: 
6: # Copy package files first to leverage cache
7: COPY package*.json ./
8: 
9: # Install dependencies
10: RUN npm ci --only=production
11: 
12: # Copy source files and build
13: COPY tsconfig.json ./
14: COPY src ./src
15: RUN npx tsc
16: 
17: # Production stage
18: FROM node:20-alpine
19: 
20: WORKDIR /app
21: 
22: # Install dumb-init for proper signal handling
23: RUN apk add --no-cache dumb-init
24: 
25: # Copy built application from builder stage
26: COPY --from=builder /app/dist ./dist
27: 
28: # Create non-root user for security
29: RUN addgroup -g 1001 -S nodejs && \
30:     adduser -S nodejs -u 1001 && \
31:     chown -R nodejs:nodejs /app
32: 
33: # Switch to non-root user
34: USER nodejs
35: 
36: # Expose port
37: EXPOSE 3000
38: 
39: # Health check
40: HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=3s --start-period=5s --retries=3 \
41:     CMD node -e "require('http').get('http://localhost:3000/health', (r) => {process.exit(r.statusCode === 200 ? 0 : 1)})"
42: 
43: # Start application
44: ENTRYPOINT ["dumb-init", "--"]
45: CMD ["node", "dist/index.js"]

(End of file - total 45 lines)

FROM node:18-alpine AS builder

WORKDIR /app

COPY package*.json ./

COPY tsconfig.json ./

WORKDIR /app

COPY --from=builder /app/package*.json ./
COPY --from=builder /app/dist ./dist
